physical_appearance:\This is a pamphlet entitled \\The Shop Assistants Employment Ordinance\\. The colony of Singapore\u0027s coat of arms is printed on the pamphlet at the top left hand corner. There is a call number pasted on the bottom left of the book
subject_terms_1:as well as an identification code on the top left. However assistants colonial settlements rules (instructional materials) employment (general economic concept)
subject_terms_2:both have been struckthrough with a blue marker. A stamp from the Social Welfare Department\u0027s Library can be seen at the bottom right of the pamphlet. There are no visible tears on the pamphlets Informational pamphlets Employees Colonies
subject_terms_3:but there is a dog ear at the bottom left corner of the book. A black and white outline of the interior of a shop
subject_terms_4:filled with customers
context_1:merchandise
context_2:and a cashier
context_3:is depicted at the centre of the pamphlet\
context_4:guidelines
context_5:Questions and answers
context_6:Singapore. Ministry of Social and Family Development
